project.name: TBI-MLLM: Tripartite Architectural Innovation for Bilingual MLLMs
project.description: Architectural innovations (vision encoder, projector, decoder merging) for Korean+English MLLM based on InternVLM

hypothesis.notes: Hypothesis defined with tripartite architecture approach; literature review completed with 25+ papers

experiment_design.notes: Comprehensive design with 16 experiments (A0-F4) across vision encoder, projector, and decoder ablations. 3-phase training protocol defined. Feasible on 2x A100-40GB with DeepSpeed ZeRO-2.

experiment_run.notes: Environment snapshot captured. 2x A100-40GB available. Setup required: PyTorch, transformers, InternVL.
